text: "Guess the DEVs had a strawberry jam as a color pallet inspiration."
"Nah, nah, I get it now. This is ~supposed~ to be HELL."
"Hellish indeed, kill me with the jam power."
"Time to show VALUE and COURAGE. You've died and come back to get your revenge!"
"You’ve already killed six of your ex-owners (maybe fewer—depends on what stage of development we're in, right?)."
"Best of luck! From here on out: shoot on sight—like a glitchy NPC or something."
